org.apache.openjpa.xmlstore
Class XMLStore

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.openjpa.xmlstore.XMLStore

public class XMLStore
extends Object

Represents a store of object data encoded in XML. This store only allows one datastore transaction to proceed at a time. File I/O errors can put this store into an invalid state.

          Constructor; supply configuration.

beginTransaction

public void beginTransaction()
Begin a datastore transaction. Obtains an exclusive write lock on the store.

endTransaction

public void endTransaction(Collection updates,
                           Collection deletes)
End the datastore transaction.

Parameters:
updates - ObjectData instances to insert or update
deletes - ObjectData instances to delete
